column1: Congratulations Joe Biden and Kamala Harris! Today we celebrate your historic win. It is not going to be an easy road ahead but I am confident that with your leadership in the White House we are up to the challenge.
As long as you are in line at an official ballot drop location by 8:00pm today have the right to vote and make your voice heard. Stay in line to cast your ballot. https://t.co/L7bd5wEMFG
Today is Election Day! Make sure you your friends and your family all have their ballots turned in at an official drop box by 8pm. https://t.co/L7bd5wEMFG

Thank you to all the election staff and officials who are working hard to ensure every vote is counted. Oregonians have returned nearly two million ballots already. Remind your friends and family to drop off their ballots by 8:00 pm tomorrow Nov. 3rd.  https://t.co/L7bd5wWnxe

I've been making real progress on the issues that matter: ☑️ Covid-19 relief for people and small businesses ☑️ Reducing the high cost of prescription drugs ☑️ Fighting for better forest management The election is 4 days away! Find your ballot drop site: https://t.co/SPZBWeC7fu

It's too late to mail in your ballot but you can still make your voice heard by using this link to find an official ballot drop location. Already voted? Share this with your friends and family who haven't! https://t.co/SPZBWeC7fu

Oregonians have returned over 1 million ballots! Is yours one of them? Tomorrow is the last day recommended to mail your ballot but you can vote using an official drop box until 8 pm on Nov. 3rd. Find a ballot drop location here: https://t.co/SPZBWeC7fu
Have you already voted? Track your ballot to make sure it was received and will be counted using the My Vote tool from the Oregon Secretary of State. https://t.co/osdbExXthB

If you have not yet received your ballot contact your local County Clerk's office so you can vote and make your voice heard! Find their contact information with the link below: https://t.co/lp3yKvWg5a

Today I mailed in my ballot at the Canby Post Office. Oregon has made voting accessible safe and secure. Vote-by mail should be available to all but the Senate failed to vote on the For The People Act. I'm committed to knocking down barriers between voters and the ballot box. https://t.co/Km2xbh2TFF

Children in our community need our support now more than ever due to the pandemic and wildfires. Join me in supporting The Clackamas Children's Safety Levy Measure 3-564 to help kids in Clackamas County impacted by neglect and abuse. https://t.co/3QrqxurIJ8

Have you made your vote plan? Ballots have been mailed and should be arriving in your mailbox soon if it's not arrived already. Mail your ballot by Oct. 27th or drop off by Nov. 3rd at 8pm at an official ballot drop site. Find the nearest site to you: https://t.co/SPZBWeC7fu

Thank you Willamette Week for your endorsement! I am proud of my work to reduce the high cost of prescription drugs. As your Congressman I will continue working to reduce costs so everyone can afford the medications they need. https://t.co/HegMLyNZHf

Today is the last day to register to vote! Take 30 seconds out of your day to register to vote or check your registration status to ensure you receive your ballot. Voting is easy safe and secure thanks to universal vote-by-mail here in Oregon. https://t.co/QYdFtipG7g

Oregon has the best natural spaces in the country and I‘m working hard to keep it that way. I am proud to have received a 100% rating with Clean Water Action. I will continue protecting our aquatic life and drinking water preserving our natural spaces for future generations. https://t.co/cDU7F0Y4qe

Before serving in Congress I was a veterinarian for more than thirty years caring for domestic and farm animals to keep our four-legged friends healthy. Thank you Animal Wellness Action for your endorsement. https://t.co/Vx0wTARe3h
Ensure your voice is heard! Oregon's voter registration deadline is Oct 13th. You can register online at: https://t.co/zkmYTOJfDC

Since Citizens United our elections have been flooded with outrageous amounts of money. That's why in 2010 and since I've introduced a constitutional amendment to overturn Citizens United to get big money out of our elections. https://t.co/nPwsuSL1ZY

I am proud to have the endorsement of the North Clackamas Chamber of Commerce. I'm fighting to get continued relief for small businesses that have been hit hard by the pandemic so they can keep their doors open and people employed. https://t.co/NfSX2xwg1q

Are you registered to vote? Today is National Voter Registration Day! You can register to vote or check your registration online to make sure it is current at https://t.co/zkmYTP0R2c #NationalVoterRegistrationDay #VoteReady
With the General Election right around the corner it's time to put up lawn signs! Email campaign@kurtschrader.com to request your lawn sign today. https://t.co/sHHbxMrQGw

If you have been displaced due to the devastating wildfires the Secretary of State has put together a guide to ensure you are able to still receive your ballot for the November election. https://t.co/9Pvx9BiTN7

Thank you to all the firefighters first responders and volunteers who have displayed such courage generosity and selflessness during these wildfires to help those who have been displaced. Coming together and helping our neighbors in their time of need that is the Oregon way.

Many of you have asked how you can help during these historic wildfires. I will be matching $5000 to help those who have been displaced. Thank you for everything you are doing to help our neighbors during these difficult times. https://t.co/iEyOZ9hyge

We have 99 days until the November 3rd election and Sen. McConnell still has done nothing to ensure every American can cast a safe and secure ballot during a pandemic. We need universal vote-by-mail nationwide. Put H.R.1 up for a vote. We cannot wait any longer.
Happy Independence Day! Today we celebrate our nation as we continue working to make the U.S. a place where everyone can succeed. Please stay safe and healthy this holiday. https://t.co/5MQMMm7xMI

Those in Lincoln County can get free masks at drive through distribution sites today. Thank you to the Community Emergency Response Team (CERT) members and Fire Districts for putting this together. Stay safe.  https://t.co/PlsKQlaJ4T
Make your voice count! Get your ballot to an official drop box by 8pm tonight to vote in today's election: https://t.co/WPiery0aWr
I am continuing to work hard in Congress to make sure we get resources to those who need them most to weather this pandemic. Thank you Daniel for your support. https://t.co/6kV6aWuJv7

This pandemic has upended our world including our elections. Everyone should have access to vote-by-mail like Oregon! To drop off your ballot use this handy drop box locator: https://t.co/WPiery0aWr https://t.co/DU1dEzxYz8
Thank you Deb for your support and your hard work to continue teaching your students remotely during this difficult time. https://t.co/Ttk5cJS1Q6
Thank you Dave for the endorsement and your continued leadership in Oregon. https://t.co/6e1zneiU1F
The voter registration deadline for the Primary is today! You can register by following the link below. https://t.co/ks1sOdmsSx

I will always support our military families and veterans. That is why I have fought to protect disabled veterans’ retirement pay protect active duty members from home foreclosure and more. Thank you Paul for your endorsement. https://t.co/8v0HnFTqk0

Climate change requires action now to stop the worst effects from hitting our communities especially our coast. Thank you Mark for your support. I will continue to prioritize real solutions to protect Oregon's lands and waters. https://t.co/aiaSzwsQDf
Commissioner Fischer is doing critical work for our communities during this difficult time. Thank you Sonya for your commitment to Clackamas County and your endorsement. https://t.co/Bxmh1VeOCD
Thank you Jerry for your support and the great work you do for our environment and community. Happy Earth Day! https://t.co/1SKc0CWYwa

Those who have served our country have sacrificed so much. I will continue working to make sure they get the respect benefits and services they deserve. Thank you Rep. Mark Meek for your endorsement. https://t.co/BihBNuf6N8

Rep. Teresa Alonso Leon continues working for an Oregon where everyone has an opportunity for a good education and a good-paying family wage job. I am honored to have her on my side. https://t.co/dzYvSmOcJv
Senator Wagner puts education and safety first for Oregon's students. I am proud to have Rob's endorsement and support. https://t.co/dG595kNagI
Treasurer Read has been working hard to make sure all Oregonians have the tools they need to be financially secure. I am honored to have his endorsement. https://t.co/HIiBq4CWvy

Thank you PCUN for your endorsement. Farm workers are essential to our country and unfortunately many won't receive any support during these tough times. That's not right. It's time for smart comprehensive immigration reform that reflects our values and strengthens our economy. https://t.co/M4k2DZSfR2

Vote-by-mail ensures democracy is available to all Oregonians during the pandemic. I supported and voted for the For the People Act which would give all Americans access to vote by mail; allowing people to stay safe and vote. The Senate needs to act! https://t.co/sfT7uBXlHh

Our essential workers are working tirelessly to keep Oregonians healthy and safe. Thank you doctors nurses first responders grocery store workers grid operators trade workers and others. https://t.co/MJzheY4R3p

Amid predictions of our toughest week in the Covid-19 pandemic it is important that Oregonians stay safe and help one another. With everyone doing their part we’ll get through this together. https://t.co/oq4yksuSqE

I am proud to have the support of our amazing teachers and classified staff here in Oregon. I will continue prioritizing funding for CTE programs and special education. As a parent that put five kids through public schools I thank you for your hard work and dedication. https://t.co/7tbEFfTB0n
Thank you Betty. I will continue prioritizing funding for education including career and technical education programs! https://t.co/YccU34jUko

I had a wonderful time at the Tillamook County Democratic Party’s monthly meeting last night talking about important issues like the Mission Act implementation Social Security Medicare and the environment. https://t.co/6GAjVM0sND

Thank you Lincoln County Democrats for having me at your monthly meeting last night to talk about the important issues we face and how we can work together to make Oregon a place where everyone can succeed. https://t.co/cbPa3FaBTh
